Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-48949 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-48949 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-14, affected by CVE-2024-48949
